forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. High 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. High 38F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 29F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around -5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 22F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High -1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High around 30F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with late-night snow showers. Low -4C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Snow showers around after midnight. Low around 25F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. High -2C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 20-30cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. High 29F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 8 to 12 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low -2C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 20-30cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 29F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 8 to 12 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High near 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. High 41F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening turning to all snow late. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low 36F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High around 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 36F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. High 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 34F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low around 0C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 32F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow during the afternoon. High 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will mix with rain at times during the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 34F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.
